actionCalls.name: Redirect_to_the_Case_Record_Page
actionCalls.label: Redirect to the Case Record Page

actionCalls.description: Initiate Approval Process for the Personnel Action record created.
actionCalls.name: Submit_for_Approval
actionCalls.label: Submit for Approval

assignments.description: In this assignment, set NatureOfAction, PathIndicatorOptions, and other variables to the values you want to use in this personnel action flow.
assignments.name: assignSetVariablesHere
assignments.label: Set Variables Here

value.stringValue: Before You Begin,Select Employee,Enter Your Request Details,Upload Documentation,Sign,SF-52 Case Submitted

choices.name: choiceReasonForChange_Position_Change_NTE
choices.choiceText: Serving on a Position Change NTE (date)

decisions.description: Pick which approval process to use based on selection on the related Nature of Action record.
decisions.name: decUseWhichApprovalProcess
decisions.label: Use Which Approval Process?

formulas.name: FormulaCaseDescription
formulas.expression: "Employee is requesting a Name Change from " & {!getManagerContact.FirstName} & " " & {!getManagerContact.LastName} & " to " & {!inputNameChange.firstName} & " " & {!inputNameChange.lastName} & " based on " & {!inputNameChangeEventReason} & " (" & {!inputIfOtherReasonPleaseExplain} & ")"

recordLookups.description: Get the Id for the HR Queue to assign the created case
recordLookups.name: getHRQueue
recordLookups.label: Get HR Queue

recordLookups.name: getNatureOfAction
recordLookups.label: Get Nature of Action for Name Change

recordLookups.name: getSF52CaseRecordTypeId
recordLookups.label: Get SF-52 Case Record Type Id

recordUpdates.description: Update the personnel action request with the requester's digital signature
recordUpdates.name: updateSignPersonnelAction
recordUpdates.label: Sign Personnel Action Request

screens.description: Screen that will show the "Before You Begin" content from the selected Nature of Action record.
screens.name: screen01
screens.label: Before You Begin

fields.name: title01
fields.fieldText:
Before You Begin

Personnel Action: {!NatureOfActionHumanReadable}

fields.name: text01a
fields.fieldText: {!getNatureOfAction.Before_You_Begin_Guidance__c}

fields.name: text01z
fields.fieldText: To continue, click the "Next" button.

fields.name: title02
fields.fieldText:
Enter Your Request Details

Personnel Action: {!NatureOfActionHumanReadable}

fields.name: text02a
fields.fieldText: Provide the details of your personnel action request in the form below:

fields.name: inputNameChangeEventReason
fields.fieldText: Name Change Event/Reason

fields.name: inputIfOtherReasonPleaseExplain
fields.fieldText: If "Other Reason", Please Explain

fields.name: inputDateOfChangeEvent
fields.fieldText: Date of Change Event

fields.name: inputProposedEffectiveDateForChange
fields.fieldText: Proposed Effective Date for Change

fields.name: inputRemarksByRequester
fields.fieldText: Any Additional Remarks

fields.name: text02z
fields.fieldText: To continue, click the "Next" button.

fields.name: title02_0
fields.fieldText:
Select the Effected Employee

Personnel Action: {!NatureOfActionHumanReadable}

fields.name: text02a_0
fields.fieldText: Select the effected employee from the list of your direct reports below:

fields.name: Employee_to_Realign
fields.fieldText: Employee to Realign

fields.name: text02z_0
fields.fieldText: To continue, click the "Next" button.

fields.name: title03
fields.fieldText:
Upload Documentation

Personnel Action: {!NatureOfActionHumanReadable}

fields.name: text03a
fields.fieldText:
Please provide the following supporting documentation for your request:


{!getNatureOfAction.Supporting_Documentation_Type__c}

fields.name: text03z
fields.fieldText: To continue, click the "Next" button.

fields.name: title04
fields.fieldText:
Certification

Personnel Action: {!NatureOfActionHumanReadable}

fields.name: text04a
fields.fieldText:
Before you can submit your request, you must agree with the following statements:


I certify that the information I submit in this request is accurate and provided in good faith.


This request is in compliance with applicable policies as I understand them.

fields.name: inputRequesterDigitallySignedRequest
fields.fieldText: I agree with these statements

fields.name: inputRequesterDigitalSignature
fields.fieldText: Digitally Sign by Typing Your Name

fields.name: text04z
fields.fieldText: To continue, click the "Next" button.

fields.name: title99
fields.fieldText:
SF-52 Case Submitted

Personnel Action: {!NatureOfActionHumanReadable}

fields.name: text01a_0
fields.fieldText:
A case has been created, submitted, and routed for appropriate approvals:


Case Number: {!getNewCase.CaseNumber}

Personnel Action Number: {!getNewPersonnelAction.Name}

Nature of Action: {!NatureOfActionHumanReadable}

Case Status: {!getNewCase.Status}

fields.name: text01z_0
fields.fieldText: No further action is required of you at this time. To review your case, click the "Next" button.

variables.description: API Name for the approval process to initiate for the personnel action
variables.name: ApprovalProcessAPIName

variables.description: Different/narrative-friendly version of the NatureOfAction value
variables.name: NatureOfActionHumanReadable

variables.description: These are the path indicator options that will be referenced on every screen.
variables.name: PathIndicatorOptions
